#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <algorithm>
#include <math.h>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int i,j,k,l,m,n,A[312], cnt1 = 0, cnt2 = 0;
	string str;
	cin>>str;
	memset(A,0,sizeof(A));
	for(i = 0; i < str.length(); i++){
		A[str[i]]++;
	}
	for(i = 0; i < 312; i++){
		if(A[i]%2==1)
		cnt1++;
	}
	if(cnt1 == 1)
	cout<<"YES"<<endl;
	else
	cout<<"NO"<<endl;
	
}
